title: Indian Refining Giant Switches From Russian to Emirati Crude
summary: Bharat Petroleum, one of the largest refiners in India, has bought a cargo of Emirati Upper Zakum crude, as it seeks alternatives to Russian oil, Reuters has reported, citing unnamed sources. The cargo is 2 million barrels, to be delivered next month. Bharat Petroleum bought it on the spot market, …

title: Energy Transition Stalls 10 Years After Paris Agreement
summary: Ten years after the landmark Paris Agreement to pursue net-zero emissions by 2050, the world faces a slowing transition to clean energy despite record-breaking renewable capacity installations.
